Deactivate account


This can be temporary.

Your account will be disabled and your names and your reels will be removed from most things you've shared. You will be able to continue using Messenger.

Delete account.


This is permanent.

When you delete ReelMe account. You won't be able to retrieve the content or information that you'e shared on ReelMe. Your messenger and all your messages will also be deleted

What would you like us to improve?

Shah Faizal built the GRADS app as a free app. This service is provided by GUIADO at no cost and intended for use as is.


This page is to inform website visitors regarding our policies with the collection use and disclosure of Personal information if anyone decided to use our service.


If you choose to use our Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation with this policy. The Personal Information that we collect are used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.


The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at GRADS, unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.


Information Collection and Use:

We are not using any of your personal information.


Log Data:

We donâ€™t log any device related information.

Changes to this privacy policy We may update our privacy policy time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any change.


Contact us:

If you any questions or suggestions, please reach us at cshahfaizal@gmail.com.

Welcome to Grads!


Grads builds technologies and services that enable people to connect with each other, build communities and grow businesses. These Terms govern your use of Grads, features, apps, services, technologies and software that we offer, except where we expressly state that separate terms (and not these) apply. These Products are provided to you by Shah Faizal.


We don't charge you to use Grads and services covered by these Terms. Instead, businesses and organisations pay us to show you ads for their products and services. By using our Products, you agree that we can show you ads that we think will be relevant to you and your interests. We dont use any of your personal data to help determine which ads to show you.


We don't sell your personal data to advertisers, and we don't share information that directly identifies you , such as your name, email address or other contact information with advertisers unless you give us specific permission. Do not use Grads if you are under 17. If you are under 18, use it only with a parent/guardian's permission.


Do not sexually harass anyone, publicize other people's private information, make statements that defame or libel anyone, violate intellectual property rights, use automated programs to start chats, or behave in any other inappropriate or illegal way on Grads. 

Understand that human behavior is fundamentally uncontrollable, that the people you encounter on Grads may not behave appropriately, and that they are solely responsible for their own behavior. Use Grads at your own peril. Write to us if anyone makes you feel uncomfortable.


You may be denied access to Grads for inappropriate behavior, or for any other reason.
We need Gallery and Camera permissions to have video selection
